text: Mainleus is a municipality in Kulmbach in Bavaria in Germany. ==Town administrative division== Mainleus is arranged in the following boroughs: * Heinersreuth * Wolpersreuth * Bechtelsreuth * Krötennest * Wüstenbuchau * Buchau * Wernstein * Willmersreuth * Dörfles * Motschenbach * Pöhl * Wüstendorf * Veitlahm * Proß * Eichberg * Fassoldshof * Rothwind * Schwarzholz * Danndorf * Schimmendorf * Schwarzach-Schmeilsdorf. ==References== Category:Kulmbach (district)
title: Mainleus
